::: Megatron glances around the Ark. And lets face it, after that explosion 
and the state the Ark was in prior to it....its completely gone. As should be 
Megatron and Ramhorn. :::

::: Megatron ::: Ah, success. The Ark is scrap, and you idiots can go on 
arguing about who will do what with me. But, I have other business to attend 
too.

::: With that said he goes into flight mode and sputters a few times before 
it kicks in and he jets away. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast, hurt from Savana, turns and slaps her to the ground. 
Transanulas, missing all of his legs and red in a tempter, shoots a web net 
over her. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Excellent! The Ark is done for. Come, we will return to 
the base.

::: Jackle, Gremlin, Transanulas, Hell Beast, and hopefully Inferno, Rampage, 
Tankkor, and Scourge return to base. :::
